NF.Q: In the column Buyer Types of the sankey chart, which nodes have an outflow exceeded 181? Please list the node labels and their corresponding outflow values.

NC.Q: Between the flows from node First-time Buyer to node Townhouse and from node First-time Buyer to node Condo, which path has a larger flow?

NC.Q: Among the flows from node First-time Buyer to node Single Family Home, from node Family to node Commercial Property, and from node First-time Buyer to node Commercial Property, which path has the largest flow?
